data.comment: The match has started, with Bournemouth kicking-off.
Tom Barkhuizen is on target to give Preston a 0-1 advantage.
In the minute 45, Gavin Ward blows to end the first-half.
Gavin Ward blows to start the second-half. Preston with the kick-off.
Sam Surridge is on a sub for Rodrigo Riquelme for Bournemouth.
In the minute 49, Preston take a comfortable 0-2 lead thanks to Scott Sinclair.
Lewis Cook (Bournemouth) has received a first yellow card.
Great finish from Patrick Bauer to give Preston a 0-3 lead.
In the minute 71, Goal! Junior Stanislas pulls one back for Bournemouth to make it 1-3.
Jason Tindall (Bournemouth) is making a second substitution, with Jaidon Anthony replacing Junior Stanislas.
The home team replace Diego Rico Salguero with Philip Billing.
In the minute 72, Bournemouth make their fourth substitution with Lloyd Kelly replacing Lewis Cook.
Ben Davies (Preston) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Jefferson Lerma is booked for the home team.
In the minute 86, Goal! Sam Surridge pulls one back to make it 2-3.
It's 2-3 as the referee blows for full-time.
Emil Riis Jakobsen is replacing Tom Barkhuizen for Preston at Vitality Stadium.
Brad Potts is on a sub for Sean Maguire for Preston.
Ben Pearson for Preston has been booked by Gavin Ward and receives a first yellow card.
Alex Neil is making the team's fifth substitution at Vitality Stadium with Tom Bayliss replacing Daniel Johnson.
Alex Neil (Preston) is making a sixth substitution, with Paul Huntington replacing Patrick Bauer.
Ryan Ledson (Preston) gets a yellow card.
